The new game was developed jointly by Kojima Productions and Platinum Games, marking the return of one of the favorite characters of the series: Raiden. It's been four years since the events of METAL GEAR SOLID 4: GUNS OF THE PATRIOTS, where he introduced the character users cybernetically enhanced. Since then, Raiden is reunited with his wife and son and is immersed in his role as security officer Maverick Security Consulting. But when a mission to protect an African Prime Minister concluded with the assassination of it at the hands of cyber attackers , Raiden hopes to have a calm life will fade to return to the front line of battle. Armed with his sword high frequency that can cut anything, be responsible to stop private militias known as Desperado Enforcement regardless. Sequences showing high speed action, where users can wield the sword Raiden through a very intuitive control system, METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE mixture chart with great delicacy and characteristic narrative style of the Metal Gear saga with a Amazing gameplay that Platinum Games has placed as one of the leading producers of action games
